movies.title: Echoes of Tomorrow
movies.summary: A scientist discovers a way to send messages to the past but risks everything to prevent a global disaster.

movies.title: Heartstrings
movies.summary: Two musicians from different worlds find love and healing through their shared passion for music.

movies.title: The Last Horizon
movies.summary: A young explorer embarks on a mythical journey to uncover the truth behind a lost civilization.
